title: Tracing The Path Of The 'Deli Man' Across North America
teaser: The film Deli Man traces the history of the delicatessen in North America, from ethnic niche to mainstream. NPR's Indira Lakshmanan talks to Erik Greenberg Anjou about his new documentary.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
